channel.title: Comments on: One Game A Day

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: AWESOME!!!! Glad to have you back in the blogosphere!
item.content:encoded: AWESOME!!!! Glad to have you back in the blogosphere!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: The thing is that leagues and tournaments only keep me occasionally committed to playing and then I have to worry about scheduling; whereas I feel like what I need to do is just play and just keep moving forward (regardless of wins or losses). =)
item.content:encoded: The thing is that leagues and tournaments only keep me occasionally committed to playing and then I have to worry about scheduling; whereas I feel like what I need to do is just play and just keep moving forward (regardless of wins or losses). =)

item.title: By: Devin Flake
item.dc:creator: Devin Flake
item.description: Good article - I need to take that advice as well. One thing I tried in the past that seemed to work is to join a tournament or the CGA league :) Then it forces me to play more games :)
item.content:encoded: Good article – I need to take that advice as well. One thing I tried in the past that seemed to work is to join a tournament or the CGA league üôÇ Then it forces me to play more games üôÇ

item.title: By: hilbert90
item.dc:creator: hilbert90
item.description: Alright. You've inspired me to start posting reviews of my games on my old blog: http://gamedecidingko.blogspot.com/
item.content:encoded: Alright. You’ve inspired me to start posting reviews of my games on my old blog: http://gamedecidingko.blogspot.com/

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Ahhh. Gotcha. Well never hesitate to ask for a game! Always glad to play against a friend!
item.content:encoded: Ahhh. Gotcha. Well never hesitate to ask for a game! Always glad to play against a friend!

item.title: By: hilbert90
item.dc:creator: hilbert90
item.description: Yes. I saw you on when I played. I almost asked for a game because no one was automatching a no rank, but then it finally went.
item.content:encoded: Yes. I saw you on when I played. I almost asked for a game because no one was automatching a no rank, but then it finally went.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Agreed. And to be honest, you're just brushing off the dust of your blade, so no worries about losing to 6 kyu! He could be a sandbagger for all you know. =D Looking forward to seeing you back online! Are you still on KGS?
item.content:encoded: Agreed. And to be honest, you’re just brushing off the dust of your blade, so no worries about losing to 6 kyu! He could be a sandbagger for all you know. =D Looking forward to seeing you back online! Are you still on KGS?

item.title: By: hilbert90
item.dc:creator: hilbert90
item.description: Yes. Last night I decided the same thing. I watch go videos, pro games, read books, ... but it had been so long since I played that I had completely lost my rank! I assumed I was around 4 kyu. I played a 6 kyu and lost :( I have a bit of playing to do to assimilate what I've learned back into my play to get myself back to where I was.
item.content:encoded: Yes. Last night I decided the same thing. I watch go videos, pro games, read books, … but it had been so long since I played that I had completely lost my rank! I assumed I was around 4 kyu. I played a 6 kyu and lost üôÅ I have a bit of playing to do to assimilate what I’ve learned back into my play to get myself back to where I was.
